**An extensive interview with the founder of WEB3**

__Why TON domains, and not ENS or Solana? What opportunities in Web3 are currently underestimated? What is the most difficult part of being a founder, and what principle will he never compromise?__

We collected your questions and added our own ‚Äî the domainer answered them all.
